Package Brick.Break.Brick

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Attribute.Colour
Brick.Break.Brick.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, GoldBrick, SteelBrick
public class Brick
extends Colour
This is the Model of Brick in the Brick MVC design pattern. This class extends from "Colour" abstract class. Originally, there was a crack inner class in this class, but I extracted it into it own class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick​(java.lang.String name, java.awt.Point pos, java.awt.Dimension size, java.awt.Color border, java.awt.Color inner, int strength)
      This is the constructor of "Brick" class. This constructor holds the data that required initialization once its object is created.
      Parameters:
      name - This parameter is the name of the brick
      pos - This parameter is the position of the bricks.
      size - This parameter is the size of the bricks.
      inner - This parameter is the inner colour of the brick.
      border - This parameter is the border colour of the brick.
      strength - This parameter is the strength of the bricks.
